mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post_metadata (postId, isPublic, isTemp, canComment, canScrap, canTrackback) VALUES (#{post.id}, #{isPublic}, #{isTemp}, #{canComment}, #{canScrap}, #{canTrackback})
mapper.update: UPDATE post_metadata SET isPublic = #{isPublic}, isTemp = #{isTemp}, canComment = #{canComment}, canScrap = #{canScrap}, canTrackback = #{canTrackback} WHERE postId = #{post.id}
mapper.select: SELECT postId, isPublic, isTemp, canComment, canScrap, canTrackback FROM post_metadata WHERE postId = #{postId}
